response.overview: Suneaters' Loving Relationship can be crusty outside, soft and warm inside. With the auteur flavorings of filmmaker W David Keith, Kansas City's Suneaters pave a wandering path through conflict and peace, affection and repulsion, the tender and the profane all ending in a generous compendium of short films tied together by their bona fide sincerity.
response.title: Loving Relationship
